reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Humanitarian aid to Pakistoan the through WHO

description.narrative: Support a total of EUR 1 000 000 to WHO's humanitarian operations in Pakistan. The humanitarian challenges are consequences of repeated natural disasters incl. floods and earthquakes and internal conflicts in the northern parts of the country. Basic health care services incl. reproductive health services remain a challenge for the humanitarian health cluster. The health cluster targets 1.2 million people most of who are internally displaced. Effective epidemiological monitoring is a priority for WHO particu larly in flood-prone areas and is critical for the reduction of morbidity and mortality. WHO supports local health authorities through training in epidemiological surveillance and management. In addition WHO provides necessary medicines and medical equipme nt and health education materials.
